column68: Profilpartners er en rekrutteringsvirksomhed, som besætter stillinger til et bredt udsnit af danske virksomheder.

column99: ACCOUNTANT - Who will be responsible for everything within finance and accounting for two Danish Companies
column100:
Workplace:  Hvidovre & Farum 
 Job description: Your position will be very independent and you will be responsible for everything within finance and accounting for Kiranto Foods and Eurogum A/S.  
 You will work closely with the two Managers in the companies, but your reference will be Seppo Hynnä (CFO) from the parent company in Finland. 
 You will be working with a wide range of tasks ranging from various reconciliations, accounts payable and receivables, bookkeeping, VAT, cash management, salaries, etc. 
 You make month-ends on time and ensure that all material is ready for the auditor when the financial statements are to be prepared. 
 As you will be the only one working with bookkeeping you will be responsible for planning your own work in order to ensure that the various tasks are solved correctly and within deadlines. 
 The Responsibles  in the 2 companies naturally have individual wishes for different tasks that they want you to handle in addition to the bookkeeping. 
 It could be the calculation of commissions and commissions to third parties, travel expenses, handling of invoices etc. 
 You are expected to be open minded and take part in the daily tasks. 
 Since you will be responsible for bookkeeping for companies, that are physically located in different cities in the metropolitan area, the idea is that you divide your time equally between the companies and the opportunity to work from home one day per week. 
 Qualifications You can handle various and different tasks simultaneously. 
 An energetic and persistent person that are good at meeting deadlines and happy to take responsibility. 
 Flexible and prepared to make an extra effort if and when necessary. 
 Able to work indepently and at the same time a good teamplayer who is quality-conscious and systematic with the tasks. 
 You are a proactive, number-minded person who gets involved and thrives in a dynamic international environment. 
 Education:  We are very open to different educational backgrounds.                   
 Work experience You have at least 3-5 years of work experience from a similar position where you have been responsible for all the accounting tasks of one or more Companies. 
 If you have experience from a producing company and/or with project accounting that is an advantage. 
 Language/IT: You master Danish and English spoken and written. 
 You are an experienced and skilled user of IT- and ERP-systems. If you have knowledge of IFS ERP, Visma or e-conomic it will be a great advantage. 
 Salary: You will receive a salary that corresponds with your qualifications, pension and health insurance. 
 We offer: A flexible and independent position in an international and dynamic environment with committed and skilled colleagues. 
 Side-by-side training in the two Companys economic systems. 
 As a part of the team of employees in both companies you will have more than 20 great colleagues. 
 Company description: Bang & Bosomer is a Finnish parent company of Kiranto Foods and Eurogum A/S - two Danish growing companies. 
 One company focuses on the Danish market, whereas the other exclusively sells to the international market. 
 If you have any questions about the position, please feel free to contact Profilpartners on tel.: 43434060.
